name: Rogue Survivor
description:
Survive As Long As You Can ... Fps Shooter

( Kill the zombies And Droids to obtain the cash and upgrade your weapon or buy powerful weapons! )

Aim , Shoot And Survive

 -  Exciting Level/ Upgrade Your Weapons. 

-  Stunning graphics and feel 

-  Unlimited fun!

How To Play ?

- WASD: Basic movements

- R: Reloading

- M1/Ctrl: Fire

- M2: Aiming

- L-Shift: Sprinting
